english : vietnamese const [booking, setBooking] = useState([ { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' } ]) const [bookingDetail, setBookingDetail] = useState({ fullName: '', applyFor: '', email: '', phone: '', request: '' }) const [numberOfPages, setNumberOfPages] = useState([1, 2, 3]) const [numberPage, setNumberPage] = useState(1) const handleClickViewDetail = (item) => { document.getElementById('detail-booking').style.cssText = ` width: 50%; opacity: 1; margin-left: 20px; ` } const handleClickCloseDetail = () => { document.getElementById('detail-booking').style.cssText = ` width: 0%; opacity: 0; margin-left: 0px; ` } return (
